Ladies and gentlemen, the 10,000 billion VND anti-flooding project
of Ho Chi Minh City is an
extremely important and urgent project with the
purpose of serving the city's people.
However, up to now the project has been late for
completion.  More than 5 years have forced the Government and the
city to have urgent plans to remove
obstacles related to the financial mechanism
for
investors. For the past 3 years, the flood prevention project has remained
dormant even though it has reached nearly 93 minutes.
The amount of
money and land fund that has not yet been paid to investors according to the
contract has caused delays in progress, causing an
increase in investment capital of more than 3,000 billion VND
and causing concerns about the loss and
waste of the built portion.  The project has
stopped construction since November
2020. The reason is that it has not been refinanced
yet, the project is still being preserved
very well waiting for the day of construction to resume because
these are problems beyond authority.
So the city reported to the Prime Minister
and proposed a plan to overcome the
problem of rising tides. If it rains,
our waterfall system will
flood very deeply without it, affecting
many people's lives.  This residents' association
wishes three things. The first is to
complete it soon so that the residents' associations can enjoy
benefits. The government has also set up a working group to
direct and control to remove obstacles,
hoping that the project will soon be promoted for construction.

Texas, ladies and gentlemen, Mr. Eny Stone,
presenter  According to the US Meta Technology Group, the
Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs has been placed on the
wanted list in this country. Many
Russian media agencies reported that Mr. Stone was
wanted in connection with a criminal case
but did not specify the details.
Russia designated Meta as an extremist organization
not long after the conflict in Ukraine
began in February last year. In March
last year, the Russian investigative committee opened a
criminal investigation into
Meta employees on charges of  accused of abetting
acts of violence against Russian citizens.
This group's applications, including Facebook and
Instagram, were also blocked in Russia for
allowing hate speech against Russians
and spreading false content about Russian
activism.  Mr. Stone
then announced that Meta had temporarily lifted the
ban on users calling for
violence against Russian military personnel.
Meta's president of global affairs,
nicknamed C, defended  that this measure is only
for Ukrainians to vent their anger at
Russia's actions. However,
Meta's policy has received many criticisms.
Secretary General of the United Nations Antonio Guz said that
allowing such statements is
unacceptable.  in any
context.
American scientists say the
world's largest iceberg is
moving in Antarctica after more than three decades.
This iceberg, named a23 A, has an area of ​​nearly
b km, or nearly three times as large.  New
York City since breaking away from the
West Antarctic Ice Shelf in 1986, an
iceberg that was once a Soviet research station
has stood still after
its base became trapped on the seabed due to
Facing strong winds and currents, the iceberg
weighing nearly 1,000 billion tons is currently drifting
quickly across the northern tip of the Antarctic peninsula.
If the speed of this giant ice sheet is increased,
it will be able to drift into the circumpolar ocean current
and carry it.  toward the Southern
Ocean on a path called
iceberg canyon where other icebergs
are drifting in the dark water there is a
possibility that a2a will land on South Georgia Island
which will cause problems for

surrounding waters. The
boat racing festival, releasing water lanterns and

regular events.  The most important year in
Cambodia is also the last long holiday
of the year for the people of
this Southeast Asian country. Yesterday afternoon, the festival
opened in the country.
King Narod Chony came to preside over the
opening ceremony.  With the participation of many
guest officials and a large number of people, the
boat racing festival this year attracted 337
racing boats from 25 localities and ministries.
Cambodia's industries participated in the biggest competition
ever. The boat racing festival,
releasing water lanterns and offering food to the moon, was
organized by Cambodian people to
thank mother water and the rivers for providing
water and protecting the land.  Fertile belt
for agricultural production
At the same time, thank heaven and earth for providing good rain
and wind, helping to buy mosquito nets and
people to have a prosperous and full life.
This year's festival takes place from the 26th to the
28th of January.  11 with many entertainment activities

Thailand, the annual super large buffet festival
for monkeys took place
today in the locality.  The familiar venue
is the city of Buri,
150 kilometers north of the capital Bangkok.
Tons of fresh fruit and many
desserts have been prepared to entertain
thousands of wild monkeys living freely in the
city with their friends.  For first-time tourists,
witnessing flocks of monkeys
competing for their favorite foods such as
bananas, mangos, durian, and watermelon cubes is
an overwhelming experience.
I think the party is to reward the
monkeys for their help.  Local people
promote the economy, but
many local people are concerned that the
large number of monkeys will affect their lives.
In 2018, the Thai government launched a
campaign to sterilize the monkey population in the
city, but the results were negative.  The reality has not improved much.
